description: Inworld TTS notification hooks with per-project voice assignment

hooks.command: python3 -c "import subprocess,sys,os;s=sys.argv[1].replace(chr(92),chr(47));s=chr(47)+s[0].lower()+s[2:] if len(s)>1 and s[1]==chr(58) else s;subprocess.run(['bash',s],env=os.environ)" ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/scripts/tts-stop-notify.sh
